TITLE.P: Kits, reagents, tests and consumables

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kits, reagents, tests and consumables

TITLE.P: Immunoblot kit for proving antibodies against Echinococcus in serum or plasma The kit should contain a maximum of test strips for 16 patients, the test strips should contain at least the antigens Em 1

SHORT_DESCR.P: Immunoblot kit for proving antibodies against Echinococcus in serum or plasma The kit should contain a maximum of test strips for 16 patients, the test strips should contain at least the antigens Em 18, Em 95, Em EgAgB, a minimum conjugate 10x concentrated, substrate containing Nitroblue tetrazolium chloride /5-Bromo-4-chloro-3-indolylphosphate (NBT/BCIP) ready to use. The obtained results should have the possibility of software processing

TITLE.P: Enzyme proteinase K in the form of a solution with a concentration of at least 20 mg/ml

SHORT_DESCR.P: Enzyme proteinase K in the form of a solution with a concentration of at least 20 mg/ml

TITLE.P: DNA polymerase with an activity of up to 250 IU, to include a minimum of a tenfold concentrated solution of Tris-HCL, KCl and MgCl2

SHORT_DESCR.P: DNA polymerase with an activity of up to 250 IU, to include a minimum of a tenfold concentrated solution of Tris-HCL, KCl and MgCl2

TITLE.P: Marker for PCR products with fragment spacing of 50 base pairs

SHORT_DESCR.P: Marker for PCR products with fragment spacing of 50 base pairs

TITLE.P: Reagent set for purification of polymerase chain reaction products using silica membrane columns including: mini spin columns, sample collection tubes and all necessary solutions, for a minimum of 50

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reagent set for purification of polymerase chain reaction products using silica membrane columns including: mini spin columns, sample collection tubes and all necessary solutions, for a minimum of 50 tests

TITLE.P: Sanger sequencing reagent containing reaction buffer with fluorescently labeled dideoxyribonucleotide triphosphates for sequencing of polymerase chain reaction products, positive control pGEM and forw

SHORT_DESCR.P: Sanger sequencing reagent containing reaction buffer with fluorescently labeled dideoxyribonucleotide triphosphates for sequencing of polymerase chain reaction products, positive control pGEM and forward control primer M13, validated for forensic applications

TITLE.P: Fluorescently labeled primers with an amount of at least 10 nmol, one unlabeled and one 5'labeled, labeled with: VIC, TET, 6FAM, HEX, NED, PET or equivalent purified by HPLC

SHORT_DESCR.P: Fluorescently labeled primers with an amount of at least 10 nmol, one unlabeled and one 5'labeled, labeled with: VIC, TET, 6FAM, HEX, NED, PET or equivalent purified by HPLC

TITLE.P: A kit of reagents for the extraction of DNA from bone, teeth and substrates containing adhesive materials, validated for forensic analysis

SHORT_DESCR.P: iA kit of reagents for the extraction of DNA from bone, teeth and substrates containing adhesive materials, validated for forensic analysis, to include at least the following reagents: a minimum of 13 ml of lysing solution, at least 52 cartridges, at least 52 sample collection tubes, at least 52 elution tubes, at least 52 extensions and extension holders, at least 52 bone/tooth lysate tubes and caps for bone/tooth lysate tubes, and a minimum of 400 µL proteinase K enzyme compatible on an Automate Express automated DNA extraction machine or equivalent

TITLE.P: A set of reagents for the extraction of DNA from liquid samples (blood and saliva), blood on FTA cards or textile material, body fluids (saliva, semen)

SHORT_DESCR.P: A set of reagents for the extraction of DNA from liquid samples (blood and saliva), blood on FTA cards or textile material, body fluids (saliva, semen) on textile material, body fluids on swabs, validated for forensic analysis, to include at least the following reagents : a minimum of 27 ml of lysing solution, at least 52 cartridges, at least 52 sample collection tubes, at least 52 elution tubes, at least 52 columns, at least 52 extensions and extension holders, compatible with an Automate Express instrument or equivalent, validated for forensic analysis

TITLE.P: Kit of reagents for the detection of the mecA gene in MRSA, by PCR technique, compatible with a real-time PCR machine Genexpert type IV or equivalent

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kit of reagents for the detection of the mecA gene in MRSA, by PCR technique, compatible with a real-time PCR machine Genexpert type IV or equivalent

TITLE.P: Hot-start Taq DNA polymerase, with a concentration of at least 5 U/μl

SHORT_DESCR.P: Hot-start Taq DNA polymerase, with a concentration of at least 5 U/μl

TITLE.P: A complete set of reagents for PCR amplification of at least 21 autosomal STR loci, at least one Y STR locus and the amelogenin locus for sex determination, using primers marked with at least 6 colors

SHORT_DESCR.P: IA complete set of reagents for PCR amplification of at least 21 autosomal STR loci, at least one Y STR locus and the amelogenin locus for sex determination, using primers marked with at least 6 colors, must include at least the following reagents: reaction solution, set from primers, control DNA and allele marker

TITLE.P: Complete reagent for rapid performance of multiplex PCR reactions without optimization, to include at least the following reagents: 2x multiplex PCR reaction mix containing HotStarTaq DNA polymerase,

SHORT_DESCR.P: Complete reagent for rapid performance of multiplex PCR reactions without optimization, to include at least the following reagents: 2x multiplex PCR reaction mix containing HotStarTaq DNA polymerase, multiplex PCR solution with dNTP, reagent with high GC content DNA amplification additive and ultrapure nuclease-free water

TITLE.P: Alkaline phosphatase enzyme for purification of PCR products for sequencing, with a minimum of 500 IU

SHORT_DESCR.P: IAlkaline phosphatase enzyme for purification of PCR products for sequencing, with a minimum of 500 IU

TITLE.P: Enzyme mixture for purification of PCR products in preparation for Sanger sequencing in one step, for a maximum of 100 reactions

SHORT_DESCR.P: Enzyme mixture for purification of PCR products in preparation for Sanger sequencing in one step, for a maximum of 100 reactions

SHORT_DESCR.P: Oligonucleotide primers with "desalt" purification, with a length of 20-30 base pairs

TITLE.P: Orange G dye, certified for biological dyes in a package of minimum 0.5 ml

SHORT_DESCR.P: Orange G dye, certified for biological dyes in a package of minimum 0.5 ml

TITLE.P: Complete set of reagents for multiplex PCR amplification of at least 23 STR loci on the Y-chromosome, validated for forensic analysis, in a package containing PCR amplification reaction, primers, alle

SHORT_DESCR.P: Complete set of reagents for multiplex PCR amplification of at least 23 STR loci on the Y-chromosome, validated for forensic analysis, in a package containing PCR amplification reaction, primers, allele marker and control DNA, validated for forensic analysis

TITLE.P: Reagents and enzymes suitable for the examination of single nucleotide polymorphisms by the process of single nucleotide extension and detection using capillary electrophoresis, with the possibility o

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reagents and enzymes suitable for the examination of single nucleotide polymorphisms by the process of single nucleotide extension and detection using capillary electrophoresis, with the possibility of examining up to 10 polymorphisms in one reaction

TITLE.P: Reaction solution for performing quantitative PCR, containing intercalating dye EvaGreen® (or equivalent) for detection of DNA amplicons, DNA polymerase enzyme, ultrapure dNTPs, MgCl2 and ROX passive

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reaction solution for performing quantitative PCR, containing intercalating dye EvaGreen® (or equivalent) for detection of DNA amplicons, DNA polymerase enzyme, ultrapure dNTPs, MgCl2 and ROX passive reference dye

TITLE.P: Kit for determination of cytokines with magnetic beads coated with antibodies, for at least 4 cytokines (Interleukin 1beta, Interleukin 6, Interleukin 8, Tumor necrosis factor alpha) by Luminex method

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kit for determination of cytokines with magnetic beads coated with antibodies, for at least 4 cytokines (Interleukin 1beta, Interleukin 6, Interleukin 8, Tumor necrosis factor alpha) by Luminex method. To include: premix of antibody-coated magnetic beads, biotinylated detection antibody mix, standardized antibody solutions, magnetic bead solvent, biotinylated antibody solvent, rinse buffer, Streptavidin-RE, flat-bottom 96-well microtiter plate and cover sticker for the tile, to contain the necessary chemicals to perform at least 96 tests.

TITLE.P: Kit for determining functional levels of K1 inhibitor protein present in human plasma or serum. To contain a minimum of C1 inhibitor standards, abnormal and normal control, 96-well plate, stop solutio

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kit for determining functional levels of K1 inhibitor protein present in human plasma or serum. To contain a minimum of C1 inhibitor standards, abnormal and normal control, 96-well plate, stop solution, 20x concentrate rinse solution, 5x sample solvent concentrate, TMB substrate, C1 inhibitor reactant, C1 inhibitor conjugate, hydration reagent.

TITLE.P: Test cartridge for the detection of bladder cancer in patients with hematuria

SHORT_DESCR.P: Test cartridge for the detection of bladder cancer in patients with hematuria, Validated sample - urine, to detect at least the following target mRNAs: ABL1, CRH, IGF2, UPK1B, ANXA10 with RT/RT PCR technology with controls included, as well as a set of reagents for isolation, amplification and detection of target mRNAs. The time for making the test should be max. 90 min. and that the test is applicable on the Genexpert platform or equivalent, in a package of at least 10 tests

Kit to contain concentrated fluorescent dye, buffer, and dissolved standards, Qubit RNA BR Assay kit (100/pkg), or equivalent

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reagent for standardizing and reproducing fragments of size 20 to 600 base pairs for capillary electrophoresis, compatible with the ABI 3500 Genetic Analyzer or equivalent, validated for forensic use, for a minimum of 800 reactions

TITLE.P: Cathode solution ready to use, in at least 4 containers, with a barcode to read, compatible with ABI 3500 genetic analyzer or equivalent

SHORT_DESCR.P: Cathode solution ready to use, in at least 4 containers, with a barcode to read, compatible with ABI 3500 genetic analyzer or equivalent

TITLE.P: Spectral calibration matrix standard required for analysis of 6-FAM, VIC, NED, SID, TAZ, and LIZ dye-labeled DNA fragments on an Applied Biosystems 3500 Genetic Analyzer or equivalent. Contain at leas

SHORT_DESCR.P: Spectral calibration matrix standard required for analysis of 6-FAM, VIC, NED, SID, TAZ, and LIZ dye-labeled DNA fragments on an Applied Biosystems 3500 Genetic Analyzer or equivalent. Contain at least 6 fluorescent color markings of a specific size. For at least 8 reactions.

TITLE.P: Test to determine LCT -13910C>T with real-time PCR compatible ABI 7500 real-time PCR instrument or equivalent. To contain a minimum of: 2x genotyping mix, LCT -13910C>T assay mix, LCT -13910C>T SS con

SHORT_DESCR.P: Test to determine LCT -13910C>T with real-time PCR compatible ABI 7500 real-time PCR instrument or equivalent. To contain a minimum of: 2x genotyping mix, LCT -13910C>T assay mix, LCT -13910C>T SS control, LCT -13910C>T TT control.

TITLE.P: Kit for determining the TA polymorphism in the UGT1A1 gene for Gilbert with real-time PCR compatible on an ABI 7500 real-time PCR machine or equivalent. To contain: UGT1A1 detection assay, deionized w

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kit for determining the TA polymorphism in the UGT1A1 gene for Gilbert with real-time PCR compatible on an ABI 7500 real-time PCR machine or equivalent. To contain: UGT1A1 detection assay, deionized water, standard wild-type UGT1A1 6TA, standard mutated UGT1A1 7TA, and standard heterozygous UGT1A1 6TA/7TA.

TITLE.P: Kit for the determination of A149P, A174D, N334K mutations and the del4E4 deletion in the ALDOB gene with a real-time PCR compatible ABI 7500 real-time PCR machine or equivalent. To contain: qPCR ALDO

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kit for the determination of A149P, A174D, N334K mutations and the del4E4 deletion in the ALDOB gene with a real-time PCR compatible ABI 7500 real-time PCR machine or equivalent. To contain: qPCR ALDOB (A149P), qPCR ALDOB (A174D), qPCR ALDOB (N334K) and qPCR ALDOB (del4E4) detection assay, wild-type ALDOB standard, mutated ALDOB standard, heterozygous ALDOB standard and deionized water.

TITLE.P: System for quantification of total human DNA and male human DNA in forensic samples using real-time PCR and TaqMan probes, with the detection of at least two autosomal loci and at least one Y-chromoso

SHORT_DESCR.P: System for quantification of total human DNA and male human DNA in forensic samples using real-time PCR and TaqMan probes, with the detection of at least two autosomal loci and at least one Y-chromosomal locus, with the ability to detect PCR inhibitors and evaluate DNA integrity of DNA. Must include reaction mix with passive reference dye, primer and probe mix, and genomic DNA standard and be compatible with a 7500 Real-Time System instrument or equivalent

TITLE.P: Reagent kit for detection of at least 12 genes (FII Prothrombin, FV Leiden, FV 1299, FV Cambridge, FV Y1702C, MTHFR 677, MTHFR 1298, MTR 2756, MTRR 66, FXIII Val34Leu, Beta-Fibrinogen 455 G>A and PAI-

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reagent kit for detection of at least 12 genes (FII Prothrombin, FV Leiden, FV 1299, FV Cambridge, FV Y1702C, MTHFR 677, MTHFR 1298, MTR 2756, MTRR 66, FXIII Val34Leu, Beta-Fibrinogen 455 G>A and PAI-1 4G/5G) with real-time PCR compatible ABI 7500 real-time PCR instrument or equivalent. Contain a minimum of 8 reaction tubes containing pairs of two ready-to-use mastermixes (with a maximum volume of 400 µL) for wild-type and mutant of all genes, Hot stat Taq DNA polymerase enzyme or equivalent, and an internal control to perform at least 20 reactions at once.

TITLE.P: Reaction mix for performing real-time PCR with TaqMan probes, compatible with the 7500 Real-Time PCR System or equivalent

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reaction mix for performing real-time PCR with TaqMan probes, compatible with the 7500 Real-Time PCR System or equivalent

TITLE.P: ABI 7500 Real-Time PCR Apparatus Spectral Calibration Kit or equivalent. Contain as a minimum: one background plate, seven spectral calibration plates with FAM/SYBR Green I, VIC/JOE and NED/TAMRA/ROX

SHORT_DESCR.P: ABI 7500 Real-Time PCR Apparatus Spectral Calibration Kit or equivalent. Contain as a minimum: one background plate, seven spectral calibration plates with FAM/SYBR Green I, VIC/JOE and NED/TAMRA/ROX color standards, and one ROI (region of interest) calibration plate.

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for automatic isolation of genomic DNA from FFREapplicable samples for nucleic acid extractor InnuPrep C16 touch system or equivalent

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for automatic isolation of genomic DNA from FFREapplicable samples for nucleic acid extractor InnuPrep C16 touch system or equivalent

TITLE.P: Set of reagents and consumables for the extraction and purification of genomic DNA from human material: fresh or frozen whole blood. The extraction process must be internally lysed and fully automated

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents and consumables for the extraction and purification of genomic DNA from human material: fresh or frozen whole blood. The extraction process must be internally lysed and fully automated, without additional steps. Samples and MAG suspension should be transferred from the start into prefilled strips or plates containing all reagents for the automated extraction, including at least the following components: MAG suspension, proteinase K, filter tips, and elution tubes validated and compatible for clinical use of the extractor for nucleic acids InnuPure C16 touch or equivalent.

TITLE.P: Urine test strips suitable for the detection of at least the following parameters: specific gravity, leukocytes, nitrites, proteins, glucose, ketone bodies, pH, urobilinogen, bilirubin, erythrocytes a

SHORT_DESCR.P: Urine test strips suitable for the detection of at least the following parameters: specific gravity, leukocytes, nitrites, proteins, glucose, ketone bodies, pH, urobilinogen, bilirubin, erythrocytes and/or hemoglobin

TITLE.P: test for rapid determination of the presence of human blood in biological traces during forensic analyses, for field and laboratory use, individually packaged, to contain a suitable solution for disso

SHORT_DESCR.P: test for rapid determination of the presence of human blood in biological traces during forensic analyses, for field and laboratory use, individually packaged, to contain a suitable solution for dissolving the biological material, a dropper and a test for a reagent unit based on a solid-phase substrate, with minimum sensitivity of 20 ng/ml and give the result for max. 10 min

TITLE.P: Test strips with an immunoassay method to prove the presence of amphetamines, cocaine/benzoylecgonine, opiates, TNS/cannabinoids, methadone and benzodiazepines in urine

SHORT_DESCR.P: Test strips with an immunoassay method to prove the presence of amphetamines, cocaine/benzoylecgonine, opiates, TNS/cannabinoids, methadone and benzodiazepines in urine

TITLE.P: International External quality control for monthly immunochemical analyzes (12X1), in lyophilized form of human serum, for the quantitative determination of up to 39 parameters: AFP, Aldosterone, AMH,

SHORT_DESCR.P: International External quality control for monthly immunochemical analyzes (12X1), in lyophilized form of human serum, for the quantitative determination of up to 39 parameters: AFP, Aldosterone, AMH, Androstendione, CA125, CA15-3, CA19-9, Calcitonin, CEA, Cortisol, C-Peptide, DHEA-S, Estradiol, Ferritin, Folate, FSH, hCG, Homocysteine, Human Growth Hormone, IgE, Insulin, LH (Luteinizing Hormone), Methylmalonic Acid, Progesterone, Prolactin, PSA free, PSA total , PTH, SHGB, T3 free, T3 total, T4 free, T4 total, Testosterone, Thyreoglobulin, TSH, Vitamin B12, Vitamin D (25-OH), 17-OH-Progesterone. At most 3ml per piece

SUITABILITY.P: statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective court
decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority,
— certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent authority,
— certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public dues by the competent authority in the country where
— certificate from the legal entities penal registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — prohibition to
participate in public competitions, public procurement contract award and public — private partnership contract
— certificate from the legal entities penal registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or
permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity,
— certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in
prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing certain business
Ability of the economic operator to perform business activity:
- Certificate for wholesale of medical devices in accordance with the Law on Drugs and Medical Devices

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: indication for which position of the technical specification the bid refers, and whose authenticity the economic
operator is obliged to confirm (if requested by the contracting authority)

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: [5.00 %]

PLACE.P: Electronically, ESJN (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/); Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —
Skopje, 50 Divizija No 6, 1000 Skopje, REPUBLIC of MACEDONIA
